slra.simObjects.utilities

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • slra.simObjects.utilities.Vertex

  • public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a mesh vertex
    Author:
    thebennybox, Henry Valentine

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vertex(Vector3f pos)
      Creates a new Vertex with default texture coordinate and normal vector
      Vertex(Vector3f pos, Vector2f texCoord)
      Creates a new vertex with default normal vector (to be calculated later)
      Vertex(Vector3f pos, Vector2f texCoord, Vector3f normal)
      Creates a new Vertex with the given position, texture mapping coordinate, and normal vector

              Vector2f texCoord,
              Vector3f normal)
        Creates a new Vertex with the given position, texture mapping coordinate, and normal vector
        Parameters:
        pos - : Position vector of this vertex
        texCoord - : Texture mapping coordinate of this vertex
        normal - : Normal vector of this vertex
